name: D3l3t3 R00t
description:
You were Abira2000, the good old fashioned antivirus Bob always kept installed in its computer. Everything was fine until he replaced you with a newer version one day and tossed YOU in the trashcan! But now you'll have your revenge... Become the virus and explore the intricate web of Bob the boomer folders, get to the computer's root and share online his darkest secrets to get your revenge! Move with caution, though, because the new Abira 2023 is scanning each folder, and if he finds you you'll be ejected!

  • Keyboard controls: Keys - Move, Spacebar - Interact
  • Gamepad controls: D-pad - Move, A - Interact

Made for GGJ 2023, the theme was "root".

Best Game Design Award - Malaga Jam Weekend XV(2023)

Post-jam update: We have added some extra details. We did some assets during the gamejam but didn't have time to implement them. We have added some extra stuff like music files too.

Still, the level design is the same as the original jam version.
